attributes.action: Remove the Home Office exemption from the Data Protection Act
attributes.additional_details: Citizens should not be denied the right to their data and further exclusions from society.
attributes.background: The Home Office has been given an exemption from GDPR and the data protection Act 2018. Citizens have a right to know what is being discussed with regard to their cases and an exemption puts us at risk of more scandals such as windrush.
